File: rb-ballad.mma

Groove: R&B-Ballad

Notes: Rythmn and Blues ballad. Based on the R&B style, just made softer and prettier. Done for "Mercy, Mercy, Mercy".

Author: Bob van der Poel

Description: Basic R&B Ballad.
